name: reCAPTCHA
body:
reCAPTCHA is an extension that replaces [ExpressionEngine's](http://www.expressionengine.com) built-in CAPTCHA with the [reCAPTCHA](http://www.google.com/recaptcha) system on member registration and comment forms.

If you donâ€™t already have your site keys, you can [get them here](https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin/create). Tick their "Enable this key on all domains (global key)" checkbox if you'll be using multiple domains for development or [MSM](http://expressionengine.com/user_guide/cp/sites/index.html) sites.

## Installation
1. Upload the `recaptcha` folder to `system/expressionengine/third_party`
2. Enable and configure the extension via `Add-Ons` > `Extensions`

## Changelog

### 1.1.0
* Uses the AJAX API over SSL (allows fully secure pages)
* Added support for Solspace's User and Freeform add-ons

### 1.0.0
* Initial release
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
